summary: The implementation covers all core requirements for Step 1 (REQ-1 through REQ-8). Worker registration, job posting, browsing/application, Internet Identity authentication, landing page, role selection, and dashboard views are all implemented with appropriate frontend and backend components. A cohesive visual design theme using OKLCH color space with professional styling is applied throughout. However, some specific acceptance criteria details are not fully verifiable from the truncated diff.
